page.title: 1614,THE SQUARE,LEASINGHAM.
page.content: 14,the Square,was originally built in{1655 }as two houses and was later built into one.During the plague it was Leasingham's mortuary house and some_where in the big garden the dead were buried.There is an old{ghost {story}about the house. One night,the old owners of the house decided to hold a Chistmas party and just about everyone was invited. After the party had gone on for a while, Mrs Yates was walking down the hall when a little man appeared,wearing a nightcap and floating over the stairs.Then he dissappeared. About a week later their daughter came back from school saying that a girl who had lived in the house before them had a rocking chair and every night a man sat cross legged in it,wearing a night_cap and rocking away and chuckling to himself.
